spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within 39 yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts 3 sec.
Summons a totem with 5% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.
Healing Tide Totem's cooldown is reduced by 45 sec and it heals for 25% more each time it pulses.
Heals the friendly target for 369,644, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 365,630, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 370,877, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 420,145 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 421,553 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 415,602 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 299,776 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 121,512 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Lasts 1 hour.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 16,157 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.9 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 390,938 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 385,474 and an additional 192,428 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 380,072 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 94,343 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 219163.5.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 5% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 967,652 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 247,970 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 549,954 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 229,856. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 596,814 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.

Learn a new weapon imbue, Tidecaller's Guard.

 Tidecaller's Guard
Imbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.4% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem and Cloudburst Totem is increased by 3.6 sec.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
Heals the friendly target for 368,841, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 362,550, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 377,344, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 419,996 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 421,201 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 420,459 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 121,446 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Lasts 1 hour.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 10 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 39 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 16,143 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 760,158 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Thunderstorm now can be cast on allies within 40 yards, reduces enemies movement speed by 60%, and knocks enemies 25% further.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.9 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 390,938 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Totemic Recall affects an additional totem.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 388,390 and an additional 192,428 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 393,268 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 221428.3.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
The lowest health target of Healing Tide Totem is healed for 30% more and receives 15% increased healing from you for 4 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 967,652 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 394,766 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.
Summons a totem at the target location with 7.7 million health for 18 sec. 33,579 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 247,970 over 9 sec.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 232,761. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
Surging Totem heals for 150% more during Ascendance.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 596,814 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.
Increases the healing done by Surging Totem by 25%.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.

Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.9 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 390,938 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 388,880 and an additional 192,428 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 379,228 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 95,126 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 215555.1.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Summons a totem at your feet for 21 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 52 yards for 30% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 967,652 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 394,480 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.
Summons a totem at the target location with 7.7 million health for 18 sec. 33,579 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 247,970 over 9 sec.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 543,829 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 228,027. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
Surging Totem heals for 150% more during Ascendance.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 596,814 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.
Increases the healing done by Surging Totem by 25%.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
